comment.author: 김성욱
comment.content: 참 희한한 친구입니다. LinkedIn 커넥션이 수백명이 넘는데도, 그 안에서 찾을 생각도 않고 그냥 예전대로 이멜을 뿌립니다. 그럴꺼면 네트워킹은 왜할까...

post.content:
This is a 3-6 month contract positon in Mississauga
If you are interested in the position please update me with your resume for sure.
Meanwhile... Please feel free to update me with your latest resume anytime. This allows me to keep you posted on relevant opportunities. If you have any friends who you can refer to me that would be great. My specialty areas are J2EE or .NET technologies at all levels.
Also: If you haven't already; link with me on LinkedIN: http://www.linkedin.com/inviteFromProfile?from=profile&key=513014&firstName=Chris&lastName=Sherret
Regards
Chris Sherret Sherret Inc. 416 423-0798 chris@sherret.com
2009-09-22-001 Back-end Java Development Contract 3-6 months Mississauga ON
We are looking for pure java developer for a 3-6 month contract position working on an Open Source platform.
Requirements: Solid Java programming and development skills High Performance backend processing for a high availablity-high performance website. Strong high performance Open Source Database experience Strong skills with efficiency and performance, sockets and cache management.
Duration: 3-6 months Location: Mississauga Rate: Likely $50+-/hr but depends on experience.
post.title: Back-end Java DevelopmentContract 3-6 months Mississauga ON
